metadata.description: A curated collection of specialized plugins for Claude Code, organized by functionality to provide focused tools for specific development tasks.

plugins.name: MarkdownTaskManager
plugins.description: A comprehensive AI-driven task management system that brings discipline and transparency to your development workflow. This plugin implements a Kanban-style task management system using local Markd...

plugins.name: bash-scripting
plugins.description: Expert tools for Bash scripting, automation, and testing with bats-core framework.

plugins.name: claude-code-development
plugins.description: Tools for developing and extending Claude Code with custom agents, commands, skills, and hooks.

plugins.name: code-quality
plugins.description: Code review, refactoring, and quality analysis tools for improving code maintainability and security.

plugins.name: documentation-generation
plugins.description: Comprehensive tools for generating API documentation, technical docs, and project documentation.

plugins.name: go-development
plugins.description: Specialized tools for Go development with goroutines, channels, interfaces, and idiomatic patterns.

plugins.name: home-assistant
plugins.description: A comprehensive Claude Code plugin for Home Assistant development, providing tools and skills for creating add-ons, integrations, and smart home automation workflows.

plugins.name: marketplace-updater
plugins.description: Automatically checks if repositories in `~/.claude/plugins/` are up to date and informs you when updates are available.

plugins.name: music-management
plugins.description: Comprehensive music library management system guidance using the beets music organization tool.

plugins.name: productivity-tools
plugins.description: Productivity enhancement tools including feature brainstorming, prompt enhancement, and dotfile management.
